cards.title: 2D Graph Plotter
cards.info: The variation of one quantity/variable with respect to another variable can be studied by plotting a graph. While plotting a graph always the independent quantity/variable should be taken on X-axis and the dependent quantity/variable should be taken on Y-axis.

cards.title: Unit Converter
cards.info: For every physical quantity you have units in different systems like SI system, MKS system, CGS system etc.  This tool gives the conversion of units of particular physical quantity from one system of unit to the other system of unit.

guide.title: Unit Converter
guide.description: For every physical quantity you have units in different systems like SI system, MKS system, CGS system etc.  This tool gives the conversion of units of particular physical quantity from one system of unit to the other system of unit.

cards.title: Area Explorer
cards.info: Area explorer is the tool used to find the perimeter and area of any shape drawn on the graph.

guide.title: Area Explorer
guide.description: Area explorer is the tool used to find the perimeter and area of any shape drawn on the graph.

cards.title: Common Logarithms
cards.info: The logarithm of a number to a given base is the exponent to which the base must be raised in order to produce that number. By using the common logarithm you can calculate the log value of the given number.

guide.title: Common Logarithms
guide.description: The logarithm of a number to a given base is the exponent to which the base must be raised in order to produce that number. By using the common logarithm you can calculate the log value of the given number.

cards.title: Multiplication Table
cards.info: This tool allows users to learn different multiplication tables. The user also has an option to switch to practice session to test their skills where they can generate custom questionnaire.

guide.title: Multiplication Table
guide.description: This tool allows users to learn different multiplication tables. The user also has an option to switch to practice session to test their skills where they can generate custom questionnaire.

cards.title: Periodic Table
cards.info: The periodic table allows students to learn about all different elements as well as their groups, properties and categories. Users can also learn about electron configurations of each element. Further more this can also be used as a reference for teaching different concepts in chemistry.

guide.title: The periodic table allows students to learn about all different elements as well as their groups, properties and categories. Users can also learn about electron configurations of each element. Further more this can also be used as a reference for teaching different concepts in chemistry.
guide.description: Click launch to view the Periodic table in detail.

cards.title: World Time
cards.info: World time is designed for students to learn about different timezones across the world. They can also use the compare mode to check differences between timezones.

guide.title: World Time
guide.description: World time is designed for students to learn about different timezones across the world. They can also use the compare mode to check differences between timezones.

cards.title: iMaps
cards.info: iMaps is an interactive quiz based on countries. Users have the option to select the desired country and set difficulties for each session to challenge their general knowledge.

cards.title: Shape Sorter
cards.info: Shape sorter is a tool designed for kids to learn about different shapes and colors. It is a fun to develop their cognitive abilities.

guide.title: Shape Sorter
guide.description: Shape sorter is a tool designed for kids to learn about different shapes and colors. It is a fun to develop their cognitive abilities.

cards.title: How To Draw
cards.info: This module is designed for primary students to teach basics of drawing. There are multiple categories with step by step tutorials, as well as a digital canvas to draw at the same time.

guide.title: How To Draw
guide.description: This module is designed for primary students to teach basics of drawing. There are multiple categories with step by step tutorials, as well as a digital canvas to draw at the same time.

cards.title: Abacus
cards.info: The abacus tool supports both modern abacus as well as the traditional abacus. Users can practice as well as learn how to represent different number using abacus, which they can translate to a real world abacus.

guide.title: Abacus
guide.description: The abacus tool supports both modern abacus as well as the traditional abacus. Users can practice as well as learn how to represent different number using abacus, which they can translate to a real world abacus.

cards.title: Clock
cards.info: The clock module is teaches primary students how to read a traditional clock with aids like digital clock, text mode and setting up custom time. There is a also a practice session available where they can answer system generated questions.

guide.title: Clock
guide.description: The clock module is teaches primary students how to read a traditional clock with aids like digital clock, text mode and setting up custom time. There is a also a practice session available where they can answer system generated questions.
